scripts.test: npm-run-all --print-name  --sequential test:make test:format test:examples test:run  test:review
scripts.test:format: elm-format src/ tests/*.elm tests/String review benchmarks --validate
scripts.fix:format: elm-format src/ tests/*.elm tests/String review benchmarks --yes
scripts.start:bench: cd benchmarks; elm make --optimize --output elm-stuff/bench.html src/Benchmarks.elm && open elm-stuff/bench.html
